response.overview: Aditya, a villager who resents his reporter brother-in-law, Akash, finds his life shattered by a brutal conspiracy. After Akash exposes the crimes of corrupt builders David and Daniel, Aditya's pregnant sister, Sandhya, becomes a target and is tragically killed. Devastated by grief, Aditya rises to take on the builders' powerful empire, seeking justice and revenge for his sister in this gripping story of love, loss, and the fight against corruption.
response.title: Challenge
